Author: stealingyourcookies
Text: Usually on my worst binge days, the next day is when my period starts. Like ‘thanks I just love being a woman’. 🤦🏼‍♀️

Author: apocalyptic_thoughts
Text: I obviously can't know for sure, but I believe that the binge was triggered by your PMS; that your future period triggered the binge.   'Some research suggests that changes in the levels of the hormones estrogen and progesterone cause cravings for foods rich in carbohydrates and sugars before a period.'  Please don't beat yourself up about it since you were fighting against your hormones more than normal. :)
